subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4386 is on the way
description_text:
Hello,

How can we solve this problem?

Thank you,

Iannuzzo Cristian

conversations.body_text:
Inviato da Outlook per iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Da: Cristian Iannuzzo <iannu_91@hotmail.it>
Inviato: Saturday, December 13, 2025 9:24:06 PM
A: SIMSONN 
Attachment(s) that exceed the 20 MB limit have been dropped. Please reach out to the sender.

Hi Cristian Iannuzzo,  Please provide your contact name, phone number, and shipping address. We will send you the ProX Ultra left-side pedal LED module tomorrow (Monday) so you can replace it quickly.

Name: Cristian Iannuzzo
Address: Don Alberto Luigi Villa 8, 20872 Cornate D'adda (MB) Italy
Phone: 339/4678830
E-mail: iannu_91@hotmail.it

But will I also be sent the instructions on how to replace the LED strip or can I find it on the website? Or is it a simple thing that you don't even need the instructions?
 Thanks

Inviato da Outlook per iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Da: service@simsonn.com
Hi Cristian Iannuzzo,       We will guide you through the replacement, which is relatively simple to do.
Hi Cristian Iannuzzo,    This is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047187429959
